TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebSocket extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class WebSocket Implements IDisposable
public ref class WebSocket abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: WebSocket 类允许应用程序在 WebSocket 升级完成后发送和接收数据。

span.span: The WebSocket class allows applications to send and receive data after the WebSocket upgrade has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 7、Windows VISTA SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 支持命名空间中的一些类。Some of the classes in the namespace are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008. 但是，Windows 8 和 Windows Server 2012 只支持客户端和服务器 Websocket 的公共实现。However, the only public implementations of client and server WebSockets are supported on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012. 在 windows 7、Windows VISTA SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 上受支持的命名空间中的类和类元素是抽象类。The classes and class elements in the namespace that are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008 are abstract classes. 这样，应用程序开发人员便可以通过实际的客户端 Websocket 实现来继承和扩展这些抽象类。This allows an application developer to inherit and extend these abstract classes with an actual implementation of client WebSockets.

summary.span: 中止 WebSocket 连接并取消任何挂起的 IO 操作。

span.span: Aborts the WebSocket connection and cancels any pending IO operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Threading.Tasks.Task CloseAsync (System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, string? statusDescription, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CloseAsync(valuetype System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, string statusDescription, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function CloseAsync (closeStatus As WebSocketCloseStatus, statusDescription As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task

public: abstract System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ CloseAsync(System::Net::WebSockets::WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, System::String ^ statusDescription, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
abstract member CloseAsync : System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus * string * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task
public abstract System.Threading.Tasks.Task CloseAsync (System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, string statusDescription, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

param.name: closeStatus
param.span: 指示关闭 WebSocket 连接的原因。

span.span: Indicates the reason for closing the WebSocket connection.

param.name: statusDescription
param.span: 指定一个可读的解释为连接关闭的原因。

span.span: Specifies a human readable explanation as to why the connection is closed.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 可用于传播有关应取消操作的通知的令牌。

span.span: The token that can be used to propagate notification that operations should be canceled.

summary.span: 使用在 WebSocket 协议规范第 7 节中定义的关闭握手关闭作为异步操作的 WebSocket 连接。

span.span: Closes the WebSocket connection as an asynchronous operation using the close handshake defined in the WebSocket protocol specification section 7.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在 WebSocket 关闭后，返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after the WebSocket has been closed. 此方法使用在 [websocket 协议规范](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06) 第7节中定义的关闭握手关闭 WebSocket 连接。This method closes the WebSocket connection using the close handshake defined in the [WebSocket protocol specification](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06) section 7.

param.name: closeStatus
param.span: 指示关闭 WebSocket 连接的原因。

span.span: Indicates the reason for closing the WebSocket connection.

param.name: statusDescription
param.span: 允许应用程序指定一个可读的解释为连接关闭的原因。

span.span: Allows applications to specify a human readable explanation as to why the connection is closed.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 可用于传播有关应取消操作的通知的令牌。

span.span: The token that can be used to propagate notification that operations should be canceled.

summary.span: 启动或完成 WebSocket 协议规范第 7 节中定义的关闭握手。

span.span: Initiates or completes the close handshake defined in the WebSocket protocol specification section 7.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在 WebSocket 上的输出关闭后，返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after the output on the WebSocket has been closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未启动关闭握手，则返回 WebSocketCloseStatus。If the close handshake has not been initiated yet, WebSocketCloseStatus.None is returned.

param.name: innerStream
param.span: 将用于 IO 操作的连接。

span.span: The connection to be used for IO operations.

param.name: subProtocol
param.span: 被客户端接受的子协议。

span.span: The subprotocol accepted by the client.

param.name: receiveBufferSize
param.span: 客户 WebSocket 接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size in bytes of the client WebSocket receive buffer.

param.name: sendBufferSize
param.span: 客户端 WebSocket 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size in bytes of the client WebSocket send buffer.

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.span: 确定帧是如何定期通过维弧连接发送的。

span.span: Determines how regularly a frame is sent over the connection as a keep-alive.

param.span: 仅当连接空闲时应用。

span.span: Applies only when the connection is idle.

param.name: useZeroMaskingKey
param.span: 指示随机键或静态键（仅指零）是否应针对 WebSocket 掩码而使用。

span.span: Indicates whether a random key or a static key (just zeros) should be used for the WebSocket masking.

param.name: internalBuffer
param.span: 在 WPC 中将用作内部缓冲区。

span.span: Will be used as the internal buffer in the WPC.

param.span: 大小必须至少为 2 \* ReceiveBufferSize + SendBufferSize + 256 + 20（32 位上的 16）。

span.span: The size has to be at least 2 \* ReceiveBufferSize + SendBufferSize + 256 + 20 (16 on 32-bit).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在 上接收到数据后，将完成返回的对象 。The returned object will complete after the data has been received on the . 每个对象上只支持一个发送和一个接收 。Exactly one send and one receive is supported on each object in parallel.
